main.name: Rahul Kumar
main.description: I eat, sleep, breath and React
main.bio: Hi there! I am Rahul! You might also know me as Backend Web Developer. I am working as a Teaching Assistant in functionUp. I've been coding for over 10 months now. As of now I'am willing and excited to work with both startups and large corporations to build & scale their companies. Along the journey I realised my passion existed in helping and pursue my dreams as upcoming developers. With this passion, as of now I have done some projects related to HTML5, CSS3, Javascript and Reactjs, Nodejs, MongoDB, Expressjs, AWS S3, Redis. I will deliver REAL VALUE by giving my best to the projects and solves the problems that will help me to enter the world of web development.

education.college: Ramgovind Institute of Technology Koderma - Jharkhand

work.title: Javascript, Nodejs, MongoDB, Express, Bycrypt, JsonWebToken, AWS S3
work.description: We have successfully completed our 5th Project, Shopping Cart, with my teammates Mohit Singh【&】Sagar Samedia. In this project we basically have added 4 features namely User, Product, Cart and Order.

work.title: Nodejs, MongoDB, Express, Javascript
work.description: 𝗢𝗽𝗲𝗻 𝘁𝗼 𝗜𝗻𝘁𝗲𝗿𝗻 𝗣𝗿𝗼𝗷𝗲𝗰𝘁, with my teammates MOHAMMAD WASIF, Mohd Farhan and Monisha Mittal. In this project we basically managed the students who want to apply for the interns in a particular college. There we introduced 3 #apis and have done the authentication, validations using different functions which was executed by mongodb and nodejs .

work.title: Nodejs, MongoDB, Express, Javascript, AWS S3, JWT, Multer
work.description: We have successfully completed our project, 𝗕𝗼𝗼𝗸𝘀 𝗠𝗮𝗻𝗮𝗴𝗲𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁 𝗦𝘆𝘀𝘁𝗲𝗺, with my teammates Md. Salik Siddiqui , Md Danish Alam and Diksha Bansod Bansod. In this project we basically managed the user, the books and the rewiew which can be given the guest or a genuine user. There we introduced 𝟭𝟬 #apis and have done the #CRUD_operations, validations using different functions which was executed by mongodb and nodejs and have also introduced the authentication and authorization

work.title: Nodejs, MongoDB, Express, Javascript, Redis
work.description: We have successfully completed our project, 𝘂𝗿𝗹𝗦𝗵𝗼𝗿𝘁𝗻𝗲𝗿, with my teammates Md Irshad ali 【&】Musharraf Ansari. There we introduced 𝟮 #apis that was defined #express #router function mongodb and nodejs ..

testimonials.text: I always believe in self learning and smart work.
Any fool can write code that a computer can understand. Good programmers write code that humans can understand.
Experience is the name everyone gives to their mistakes.
